item.title: Speech Recognition with DeepSpeech
item.description: Overview DeepSpeech is a speech recognition engine developed by Mozilla that uses a model trained by machine learning techniques. This recipe will explain how to make use of this tool for speech recognition. Ingredients Linux environment (tested on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS x64) APT dependencies: docker (>= 20.10.2), python3 (>= 3.7), venv The speech recognition repository available in this link Setup First, clone the repository provided in the Ingredients section. Once cloned you must copy the audios, in .
